timeline.bodyHTML:
Class fields mutation makes code confusing. To my mind it would more clearly to refactor this lines:

toolGroup.setTools(toolList);
toolGroupWithoutPermission.setTools(toolList);
dockerRegistryWithTools.setGroups(toolGroups);

I would suggest two options:

  1. create a new objects into the test
  2. initialize this fields at the tests class beginning
timeline.author: ekazachkova
